department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Title
SF051000 Sensfly EbeeX Aircraft or Equivalent

## Contract Number and Details
Contract Number: PW-CAG-011-28916
Solicitation Number: 23240-230719/A
Publication Date: January 13, 2023
Tender Closing Date and Time: January 30, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST
Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
End User Entity: Natural Resources Canada

## Requirements and Scope
The Requirements are for the supply and delivery of one (1) SF051000 Sensfly eBeeX Aircraft (or equivalent) Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) with training and support. The equipment must be delivered on or before March 31, 2023.

## Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and other international trade agreements relevant to Canada.

## Regions of Opportunity
The region of opportunity for this contract is specifically in Nova Scotia, Canada.

## Evaluation Criteria
The Evaluation Criteria for the Statement of Capabilities (Minimum Essential Requirements) are as follows:

* SenseFly eBee X Aircraft
* SenseFly S.O.D.A. 3D
* SenseFly eBee X RTK/PPK Activation
* Sensefly eBee X Endurance Activation
* eBee X Spare and Maintenance Kit
* 2 SenseFly eBee X Batteries - Endurance
* SenseFly Duet T with eBee X Integration Kit
* Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) Pilot Training

## Contact Information
Contact Person:
Annie George-Madhu
Contact Number: 873-355-3329
Contact Email: annie.george-madhu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Conditions of the Contract
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any terms of the contract.

## Languages and Submission Requirements
The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Terms of Services
The contract is for a period of 31st day of March, 2023, inclusive, and the delivery of the equipment must be made on or before this date.
